title: Skins(and RP) from my point of view
body:
As a newish player to League, I find enjoyment in finding out new things that the game has. A couple of months ago, I decided to take a look around the shop and finally found one of the most prominent features of the whole game : skins. I really wanted to get one(despite only being a cosmetic) but didn't have the RP. After asking some people, I learned that RP is a currency that is bought with real money and is usable for pretty much anything in the shop. After this, I thought that it was depressing that only people that had extra money could get such glorious skins(Project: Ashe is the best) and wanted to see if there are other people who find this to be annoying. 

 I also want to ask if there could possibly be a way for Riot to add a way to transfer IP into RP so then all players can get a skin or two after they work hard for a skin rather than just buying it.

Edit:I forgot about hex tech crafting >.<
I feel like an idiot

You can get skins through boxes, up to 4 per month, and they're 100% free. All you need to do is play well enough (or play with people who do well enough to get Ss)

Well there's a trick to it. All you need to do is being in a premade with somebody who got an S and be using a champion that you own and haven't gotten a box for yet.

I really don't play too many champs well enough to get Ss, but I'm good enough with with Jinx, Zyra and Akali that I'll consistently get an S about once evey 3 games or so. And I have a friend that can usually get Ss with Ahri and Teemo, so what we do is I'll play a few games with her as Zyra or Akali while she plays with champs she hasn't gotten boxes for, and then we'll switch and she'll be in charge with getting the S while I'll play the champs I'm not good with. That way we're always maxing out our boxes somewhat easily.
Will you play with me?  XD
I wouldn't mind but I'm too busy with school to play anymore, lately I'm just playing bots once a day for the bonus IP really. But feel free to add me up if you want.
EVERYTHING you need to win is FREE, it is not pay to win. Cosmetics cost and that is fair! They are a business after all...
